post.description: This API enables applications to initiate the digital signing process. The API is provisioned as a RESTful service and uses JSON as the data interchange format. You can use the example JSON from here as input body payload: https://gsa.github.io/DSSAPIDocumentation/api-docs/console/createPackageExample.json .

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON Data for DSS create package

post.responses: All the Errors and Messages have been listed at: https://gsa.github.io/DSSAPIDocumentation/api-docs/createPackageErrors.html.

551.description: Validation Error. OrgName provided does not match the package org name.

552.description: Validation Error. Package exist in EDMS.

553.description: Validation Error. Please enter a valid Pagcake ID and Org Name

404.description: Resource not found..  Please check the URL or the Package ID

500.description: System Error. There was a system error. Please contact DSS team.

401.description: Authorization Error. There was a system error. Please contact DSS team.

400.description: System Error. There was a system error. Please contact DSS team.

550.description: Validation Error. Organization Name not provided or is empty.

540.description: Validation Error. Package Name not provided or is empty.

541.description: Validation Error. Sender email not provided or is empty.

542.description: Validation Error. Sender email address not provided or is invalid.

543.description: Validation Error. Package Option not provided or is empty. Valid values are ‘Create’ or ‘CreateSend’.

544.description: Validation Error. Document Name not provided or is empty.

545.description: Validation Error. Document Content not provide or is empty. The API accepts Document Content as base64Encoded String.

546.description: Validation Error. Signer email not provided or is empty.

547.description: Validation Error. Signer email not provided or is invalid.

548.description: Validation Error. Signer First Name not provided or is empty.

549.description: Validation Error. Signer Last Name not provided or is empty.

561.description: Validation Error. Search text not provided or is empty.

562.description: Validation Error. Document Name is invalid. The API accepts .pdf documents only.

563.description: Validation Error. Template Id not provided or is empty.

564.description: Validation Error. Number of signers provided do not match the number of signature placeholders in the template.

565.description: Validation Error. Document layout name not provided or is empty.

566.description: Validation Error. Document layout name provided is incorrect.

567.description: Validation Error. File could not be decoded.

568.description: Validation Error. Number of placeholders is more than number of signers.

569.description: Validation Error. Placeholder name provided does not exists or is invalid.

570.description: Validation Error. Placeholder name not provided or is empty.

571.description: Validation Error. Package Option not provided or is empty. Valid values are ‘Archive’ or ‘Delete’.

572.description: Validation Error. Package Id not provided or is empty.

573.description: Validation Error. Package name already in use. Please change the package name.

574.description: Validation Error. New user TYPE not provided or is empty

575.description: Validation Error. New User Last Name not provided or is empty.

576.description: Validation Error. New User First Name not provided or is empty.

577.description: Validation Error. The specified queue does not exists.

578.description: Validation Error. The specified queue has no messages.

post.description: This API enables applications to initiate the digital signature signing ceremony. The API is provisioned as a RESTful service and uses JSON as the data interchange format. Document and attachment files can be attached separately and sent as another key value pair.
This API enables applications to initiate the digital signature signing ceremony. The API is provisioned as a RESTful service and uses JSON as the data interchange format.

ID.description: Generated unique identifier for te package.
